body.name: Sofslee Shredded Memory Foam Pillows Queen Size Set of 2, Adjustable Cooling Pillows 2 Pack, Luxury Queen Bed Pillows for Sleeping for Side Back Stomach Sleepers, with Washable Removable Cover
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 41 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Adjustable Height and Firmness & Pain Relief: Shredded foam standard pillows are made to satisfy different needs of stomach, back and side sleepers. Simply unzip the cover and add or remove fillings to suit your head, neck and shoulders. The right pillows will relieve pain and improve sleep.

Certified Premium Materials: All the fluffy bed pillows are OEKO-TEX Standard and CertiPUR-US Certified that ensures textiles meet high safety and environmental standards. Skin-friendly materials even for babies!

Bamboo Cooling Pillows: The 3D honeycomb air layer design fabric added with bamboo fiber is more skin-friendly, breathable and heat dissipating, providing a healthier and cooler sleeping environment. The pillow cover with zipper design, easy to remove and clean.

Never Flatten: The shredded foam filling in the pillows will not flatten or clump even after a long term use and is highly resilient, breaking down pressure on its own. The adjustable design also helps to better fit your body shape and sleeping position, providing long-lasting comfort.
Buy with Confidence: Your satisfaction is our priority! If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, please do not hesitate to let us know immediately, we will find the best solution for you!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enjoy Five-star Hotel Experience at Home

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Blend of Comfort and Support
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Sofslee Pillows in the standard size, and after using them for a few days, I am delighted to share my experience. I appreciate the attention to detail in the construction, as the stitching is impeccable, giving the pillows a polished and refined look. The pillows are median firm. This makes them an excellent choice for me, who prefer a pillow that strikes the right balance between softness and support. The pillows support my head and neck, promoting a comfortable sleeping position without sacrificing the plush feel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Memory foam pillows
reviews.reviewText: These memory foam pillows are the unsung heroes of a restful night's sleep. Engineered to contour to your head and neck, they offer personalized support, alleviating pressure points and promoting proper spinal alignment. The adaptive nature of memory foam ensures a custom fit, regardless of your preferred sleeping position, making it an excellent choice for a wide range of sleepers. Its ability to bounce back to its original shape maintains consistent support over time. Moreover, these pillows often come with hypoallergenic properties, catering to those with allergies. If you're in search of a pillow that embraces you with comfort, molds to your unique shape, and ensures a rejuvenating sleep, memory foam pillows might be your dream come true.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really didn't expect much from these pillows. I just wanted a decent down alternative that wasn't clunky or too thin, and could maintain its shape. I've heard some bad things about straight memory foam pillows not holding up after just a year, and the cotton filled pillows are always too thin and flimsy.When I saw these pillows could be opened and one could remove or add filling to their liking, and that they were relatively cheap and not just straight memory foam, I figured they would be worth a shot.The pillows are surprisingly thick and firm, but still soft and maleable. I sleep on my side and stomach mostly, and they can form to those positions seemlessly. I haven't even felt the need to touch the level of stuffing, but I have kept one pillow off to the side just in case; but after a week of using them, I can safely say they are exactly the pillows I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pillow to improve my my sleep experience. As a combination sleeper, I appreciate the adjustability these pillows offer, providing the perfect support whether I'm on my side, back, or stomach. The shredded memory foam not only molds to my preferred sleeping position but also stays cool throughout the night. The set of two pillows ensures consistent comfort, and the washable removable cover adds a practical touch. I really like it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ready perfect firmness. Supports your neck and great value as it comes in a pair! When I first bought it I thought it was only one because of the price. But it has two which was a surprise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Read reviews on many pillows and after reading reviews on this one I decided to try them. I had a stiff neck with pain. This pillow gave me the neck support that I needed and neck pain is gone. It took a couple nights to get use to the new pillow but I am now very satisfied and plan to purchase more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good and comfortable pillow
reviews.reviewText: I tried this pillow after I received it. This pillow could hold you neck and shoulder easily and gives a good support for you muscles. I woke up the next morning and didn’t feel tired at all. I will rate it at 5. It’s very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality. Medium hardness
reviews.reviewText: I opened the pillow up and it immediately puffed up. I really like the harness of the pillow. Like it supports your head but not overly firm. I do notice the standard size is a little smaller than I thought so just be careful with the size
